Thank you for playing Chicken Road!
Your privacy is very important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your data when you play our game.

1. Information We Collect

Chicken Road does not collect any personal information.
We do not request, store, or process your name, email, or any identifying details.

The only data we may receive are anonymous analytics (such as number of sessions or average playtime) to help improve game performance and stability.

2. Third-Party Services

Some versions of Chicken Road may use third-party services such as:

Google Play Services

Unity Analytics

AdMob (for ads)

These third parties may collect anonymous usage data according to their own privacy policies.

3. Data Security

We do not store personal data on our servers. Any analytics data are securely handled by trusted third-party providers.
